title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jun 29 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: President Trump joins Clay and Buck. Trump on Rush. Trump: The world doesn't respect Biden. Trump: The border is the worst it's ever been in history. Trump on cable news ratings. Trump on Tucker Carlson's allegations that the NSA spied on him. Trump on the origins of the virus in Wuhan lab, China reparations. Trump on the Russia hoax. Trump on RINOs and infrastrucure deal. Trump says Herschel Walker should run for Senate in Georgia. Trump on illegal immigration: I kept them in Mexico. Trump on Hunter Biden. Trump on NY investigation into the Trump administration: continuation of the witch hunt. Trump to GOP: Don't negotiate away the tax cuts. Trump on Biden and Iran. Trump on when he'll decide if he's running in 2024.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
